titles.title: Hazard Pay Expansion Act
To amend title 37, United States Code, to extend eligibility for hazardous duty pay to members of the uniformed services exposed to the cause of a declared public health emergency.
Hazard Pay Expansion Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Hazard Pay Expansion Act
This bill permits the uniformed services to pay hazardous duty pay to a servicemember who, during a declared national public health emergency, performs duty deemed hazardous based upon frequent exposure to the cause of that public health emergency.
